title: Coavins Firearms Models
description: Models file for Coavins Firearms, a Project Zomboid mod

primaryComponent.description: The primary part for this model. When the firearm is disassembled, its specific type will be saved within this part. This is done because multiple firearms may share the same model, and we need to know how to reconstitute the original firearm if the parts are combined again later. Typically the receiver is used in this role.

requiredComponents.description: The subsidiary parts for this model. When assembled together with the primary, the player will create a firearm. The player must provide all required components, including the primary component, or the firearm cannot be assembled.

defaultItem.description: The default item that the player receives when carrying out assembly using a primary component that has no type saved on it. This can happen when the primary component was found through scavenging.

optionalComponents.description: Optional parts for this model. Not currently used.
